Lifelihood 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Run lifelihood program

    run_lifelihood_console.Rd

    Run lifelihood program in console mode

    Usage

    run_lifelihood_console(
  infile = "100%mort_Pierrick211genoparinteraction.txt",
  customfile = "custom.txt",
  GbyG = 0,
  MCMC = 0,
  interval = 25,
  SEcal = 0,
  saveprobevent = 0,
  fitness = 0,
  r = 0,
  seed1 = 12,
  seed2 = 13,
  seed3 = 14,
  seed4 = 15,
  ntr = 2,
  nst = 2,
  To = 50,
  Tf = 1,
  climbrate = 1,
  precision = 0.001
)

    Arguments

    infile

    file with the model and data to be fitted

    customfile

    file with the min and max boudaries for each parameter

    GbyG

    Option to fit the full factorail model with all the interactions between each of the factors

    MCMC

    Perform MCMC sampling of the parameter after convergence to estimate their 95% confidence interval

    interval

    TBD - Check the actual meaning

    SEcal

    Compute the standard error of eahc parameter using the Hessian matrix

    saveprobevent

    TBD - Check the actual meaning

    fitness

    Reparametrize the model with one parameter as the lifetime reproductive success

    r

    Reparametrize the model with one parameter as the intrinsic rate of increase

    seed1

    first seed used so that random values can found again (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Multiply-with-carry_pseudorandom_number_generator)

    seed2

    second seed used so that random values can found again

    seed3

    third seed used so that random values can found again

    seed4

    fourth seed used so that random values can found again

    ntr

    number of thread for the paralelisation ?

    nst

    TBD - Check the actual meaning

    To

    Initial temperature for the simulated annealing

    Tf

    Initial temperature for the simulated annealing

    climbrate

    Rate for the simulated annealing ?

    precision

    TBD - Check the actual meaning

    Value

    dataset with the simulated hatch rate

    Examples

    run_lifelihood_console(infile="100%mort_Pierrick211genoparinteraction.txt", ntr=10, To=50, Tf=1, seed2=34)
#> [1] "\\Users\\josephbarbier\\Desktop\\Lifelihood\\docs\\reference\\100%mort_Pierrick211genoparinteraction.txt \\Users\\josephbarbier\\Desktop\\Lifelihood\\docs\\reference\\custom.txt 0 0 25 0 0 0 0 12 34 14 15 10 2 50 1 1 0.001"
#> arguments 'show.output.on.console', 'minimized' and 'invisible' are for Windows only
#> Warning: error in running command
